# wrapper.py

## Plot_pie

Make pie plot

### Parameters
- data : pd.DataFrame
    - pandas.DataFrame included data to make pie chart
- target : str
    - String which column you would like to use for pie chart

### Returns

plotly.graph_objects

Object of pie chart
